biotools.summary: Pathway Network Visualizer (PaNeV) is an R package for a pathway-based network visualization. Based on information available on KEGG, it maps and visualizes genes within a network of upstream and downstream-connected pathways (from 1 to n levels). The graph helps to interpret functional profiles of cluster of genes.
